dcterms:creator: N. F. Thornhill
S. C. Patwardhan
S. L. Shah
dcterms:description: A continuous stirred tank heater simulation model widely utilized as a benchmark for multimode process monitoring, focusing on mixing hot and cold water with desirable settings.
dcterms:title: Continuous Stirred Tank Heater (CSTH)

dcterms:creator: J. Zhang
D. Zhou
M. Chen
dcterms:description: Data from a coal pulverizing system used to monitor multimode processes, focusing on grinding raw coal into pulverized coal with desired fineness and optimal temperature.
dcterms:title: Coal Pulverizing System
